long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PM Sentry is a toolset enforcing collaboration, focused on the needs of Project Managers and Team Leaders. It’s built on top of time tracker system that helps project members to be in sync and log their work. 

Use PM Sentry to track your tasks in real time. You can start measuring time for tasks created in PM Sentry, or for tasks from the project/task management software of your choice (including: Jira, Trello, CodeBaseHQ) thanks to integrations powered by browser plug-in. If you want to start tracking time for your ticket in Jira or CodeBaseHQ all you need is to setup your account and projects, click your PM Sentry Chrome Extension on the page with chosen ticket and start measuring your time session!
